MCGOWAN / BARRYMORE / STILLER / ALBA





(McGowan avoids the grenades and =
jumps over the minigun shots. She fires 2 missiles at Seekker...)



(Barry=
more dodges the grenade but is struck by the minigun shots. She fires 3 las=
er beams at Seekker...)



(Stiller is hit by the minigun blast. He pulls h=
is crossbow out and fires 2 arrows at Seekker. Then he puts his crossbow ba=
ck in it's holster and extends his middle finger towards Seekker. He turns =
back to Arrow.)



Stiller: I want this to be a fair fight. That means I do=
n't want none of those Chivtrons butting in. You tell your team mates to ba=
ck off, and I'm sure mine will have no problem with giving me this fight...=




(Stiller awaits an answer from Arrow...)



(Alba is struck by minigun =
blasts. She growls and jerks a long rod from a holster on her back. It has =
a large handle and the tip was jagged and spiked. The handle was a yellow b=
ut the rod was a cold grey. Alba extends her arm, taking aim, and firing a =
jolt of electricity at Seekker...)

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From:=
 Jordan Guthrie 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Monday, July 09, 200=
1 1:23 AM
  Subject: Re: Clash


  Seekker ran up to the pod diving behind =
it rolling along the ground 
  until beside Axis.  He looks both ways then =
up and down.  Now looking at 
  Axis stares him in the eyes. The small bot =
grabs at Axis face with both 
  hands.  "THIS IS WAR BOY.  THIS ISN'T YOUR =
PANSY ACCADEMY TRAINING, THIS 
  IS THE REAL THING.  NOW LITSEN TO ME, PRIV=
ATE, I WANT YOU TO GET OUT 
  THERE AND SHOW THOSE ENEMY'S HOW FAR OVER THE=
 LINE THEY ARE.  YOU GOT 
  THAT YOU PIECE OF PRIVATE PISTONS." he yelled a=
t Axis believeing he 
  himself was a war general.  He then looked straigh =
back from the pod. 
  "Bring it on..." he said.  He then turned jumping up =
onto the top of the 
  pod, his two miniguns under each arm ringing out 20 =
shots each.  Both 
  his hands carried small explosive grenades. Throwing o=
ne at Barrymore 
  and the other at McGowan.  The crazy shots from his mini=
gun fly toward 
  McGowan, Barrymore, Stiller and Alba in very bad accuracy=
. "HAR HAR. YOU 
  REBELS WILL LEARN A LESSON, SEEKKER STYLE"  Seekker stil=
l stood atop the 
  pod.

  rauq@... wrote:

  > --- Lokk / Axis / Ly=
nxiz ---
  > 
  > Lynxiz quickly flattens herself to the ground, avoiding m=
ost of the
  > wildly fired shots though in her dodging efforts, several bu=
llets dug
  > into her armour, and glanced off of her back. She stays on th=
e
  > ground, and notices Nightlight being approached by Depp. A
  > growin=
g sense of doom builds as she gets to her feet and fires two
  > disks at D=
epp. Immediately after firing the disks, she puts her gun
  > away and star=
ts to sprint towards Depp thinking, <<I can't let this
  > happen...>> as s=
he prepares for close combat mode. Her claws
  > extend from her hands with=
 a metallic ringing.
  > 
  > Axis, not sure what to do, waits behind the p=
od, hoping that the
  > heavy heat resistant re-entry armour on the pod wil=
l hold out for this
  > battle. Without looking, he yells, "LOKK?" Wanting =
to make sure
  > that Lokk is ok.
  > 
  > Lokk creaps around, weaving thro=
ugh trees. Exiting the forest, he
  > hids behind a near by rock. Keeping l=
ow to the ground, he crawls
  > along still trying to get behind the enemy =
and he's almost there.
  >

 Yahoo! Terms of Service 
  > <http://docs.yahoo.com/info/terms/>.
